body_html: @ArtsiomCh The missing conversion does need to be remedied, but in the meantime as a workaround you could try overriding CameraActivity.useCamera2API = true. This will force it to use the camera2 API, which we may be too aggressive in disabling in some cases.
body_text: @ArtsiomCh The missing conversion does need to be remedied, but in the meantime as a workaround you could try overriding CameraActivity.useCamera2API = true. This will force it to use the camera2 API, which we may be too aggressive in disabling in some cases.
body: @ArtsiomCh The missing conversion does need to be remedied, but in the meantime as a workaround you could try overriding CameraActivity.useCamera2API = true. This will force it to use the camera2 API, which we may be too aggressive in disabling in some cases.
